Introduction

Juntae (Kim Jun Tae) is a skilled vocalist, songwriter, and composer, now leading IN A MINUTE under JWIN Entertainment. Previously a member of TREI and the duo JT&MARCUS, he has established himself as a multifaceted artist. His songwriting and composition credits include work for OMEGA X and TAN, showcasing his creative depth.

Now, alongside Jaejun and Hyunyeop, he is set to debut with IN A MINUTE on March 15, 2025, with their first single album, UNBOXING: WHAT YOU WANTED. With his leadership and musical expertise, Juntae aims to bring a distinct sound and vision to the group’s debut.
